notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Data cannot be made available due to ethical restrictions imposed by University of Auckland Human Participants Ethics Committee. A de-identified dataset is available upon request from the corresponding author for all appropriately qualified researchers. A de-identified dataset is also available from any member of the advisory board of the New Zealand Attitudes and Values Study ( www.nzvalues.org). The University of Auckland Human Participants Ethics Committee can be contacted at ro-ethics@auckland.ac.nz.
